actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the offering of prayer in public buildings.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that nothing in the Constitution shall abridge the right of persons lawfully assembled, in any public building which is supported in whole or in part through the expenditure of public funds, to participate in nondenominational prayer or Bible reading.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to the offering of prayer in public buildings.
